posts.title: About Me
posts.body: I am a current student at Calvin University studying Computer Science with a minor in German Studies. I love to program and learn about the inner workings of systems, and am interested in working in information security or development when I graduate.

posts.title: Experience
posts.body: I currently work as a Application development intern at Priority Health. I have previously worked at Hekman Library doing development and at Calvin Information Technology as a Helpdesk Technician. I am interested in full time opportunities in Software Engineering.

posts.title: What I'm Currently Learning
posts.body: Im currently learning rust, WASM, and WebGL to try to simulate the conditions of hurricane sandy in 2012.

posts.title: What I enjoy programming in
posts.body: My favorite languages are Rust, JavaScript, and C. I also don't mind Perl, C#, and Python.

posts.title: Projects
posts.body: This is a short list of a couple of my projects: (These and others can be found on my github)

list.text: This website, written in React and styled with Tailwind Css
Dark mode everywhere, a chrome extension for making non dark mode websites darker
ESP2866 LCD writer, a micropython firmware for a custom circuit board I built and had printed
